channel.title: Source Themes on Xiaotao Shen
channel.description: Recent content in Source Themes on Xiaotao Shen

item.title: Metabolic Reaction Network-based Recursive Metabolite Annotation for Untargeted Metabolomics
item.description: Here, we develop a metabolic reaction network (MRN)-based recursive algorithm (MetDNA) that expands metabolite annotations without the need for a comprehensive standard spectral library.

item.title: MetFlow an interactive and integrated workflow for metabolomics data cleaning and differential metabolite discovery
item.description: Mass spectrometry-based metabolomics aims to profile the metabolic changes in biological systems and identify differential metabolites related to physiological phenotypes and aberrant activities.

item.title: MetFlow an interactive and integrated workflow for metabolomics data cleaning and differential metabolite discovery
item.description: Mass spectrometry-based metabolomics aims to profile the metabolic changes in biological systems and identify differential metabolites related to physiological phenotypes and aberrant activities.
